speaker: Agent
text: Good afternoon, this is Jessica calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing okay, thank you. What can I help you with?

speaker: Agent
text: I am reaching out to discuss your account with ABC Lending. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. Can you also confirm the address on file: 123 Maple Street?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! You currently have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to handle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of that today, will that work?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, a payment of $125 will be accepted today. Would you prefer to do this online or over the phone?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I’ll send you a link to complete the payment. Thank you for your cooperation.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
